com.gwidgets.api.leaflet

Class Popup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gwidgets.api.leaflet.Popup

  • @JsType(isNative=true)
public class Popup
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to open popups in certain places of the map. Use openPopup of the Map class to open popups while making sure that only one popup is open at one time (recommended for usability), or use of addLayer method of the Map class to open as many as you want.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      L addTo(Map map)
      Adds the popup to the map.
      L getLatLng()
      Returns the geographical point of popup.
      L openOn(Map map)
      Adds the popup to the map and closes the previous one.

      Sets the HTML content of the popup.
      L setContent(java.lang.String htmlContent)
      Sets the HTML content of the popup.
      L setLatLng(LatLng latlng)
      Sets the geographical point where the popup will open.
      L update()
      Updates the popup content, layout and position.

public L openOn(Map map)

      • update

        @JsMethod
public L update()

        the L class
